basics.name: Wesley Putumuju
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary:
I started working with Linux professionally in 2014, acquiring knowledge and experience in support, system customization, embedded systems, server deployment and administration, and all kind of work involved in Linux service provisioning

Working with a wide range of distributions and integration of Linux-based systems with other operating systems, as well as absorbing knowledge of new technologies and actively doing DevOps and Linux/Unix consulting in deployment and support of database and application server infrastructures, security, environment integration and virtualization.

Graduated in Computer Science with several years of experience in information technology, specialist in Linux, Cloud with experience and focus on DevOps and automation.

Experience in defining, building and operating resilient and scalable infrastructures, with high volume of information/transactions, reducing operational work through automation (IaC) and actively fostering DevOps culture

work.name: Mobileum
work.summary:
Trabalhei como especialista interno em nuvem para sistemas de detecção de fraudes em telecomunicações de alta demanda para grandes empresas de telecomunicações na Europa (como T-Mobile Netherlands, Orange Romenia, Telefonica Spain).

Minhas responsabilidades incluíam:

Colaborar com equipes multifuncionais, incluindo desenvolvedores, engenheiros de rede e gerentes de projeto, para garantir a entrega tranquila de projetos em nuvem.

Monitorar e manter a saúde e desempenho da infraestrutura de nuvem, identificando e resolvendo quaisquer problemas que surgissem.

Projetar e implementar uma infraestrutura escalável, altamente disponível e economicamente viável em nuvem para suportar as crescentes necessidades de negócios da empresa.

Implementar medidas de segurança para atender aos padrões da indústria e proteger dados sensíveis do cliente.

work.name: Jumia Group
work.summary: I worked as an SRE at one of the most influential E-Commerce companies in Africa. My responsibilities included: Monitoring and troubleshooting Kubernetes Maintenance and monitoring of CI/CD Scaling cloud projects Implementation of new functions using tools such as Ansible and Helm.

work.name: RedFox Digital Solutions
work.summary:
I was responsible for the following tasks:

Implementing and maintaining DevOps processes for Linux servers, ensuring that the servers were properly configured and optimized to support business needs.

Managing infrastructure using Infrastructure-as-Code (IAC) methodology, ensuring that the infrastructure was consistently maintained and updated to meet evolving business requirements.

Overseeing Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) processes to ensure that software changes were delivered to production efficiently and reliably.

Leading efforts in creating and modifying products as needed, working closely with cross-functional teams to ensure that products met business requirements.

Directing cloud projects utilizing Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Google Cloud Platform (GCP), while maintaining accountability for all aspects of project management. This included project planning, resource allocation, risk management, and stakeholder communication.

work.name: RHS Licitações
work.summary:
I was responsible for the administration of all Linux servers across the organization. This involved overseeing the management of CentOS servers and their associated services, including Networking Management and Administration, KVM/ESXi Virtualization, User Management, NAS Configuration and Management, Bash Scripting, Zabbix Monitoring, and other General Linux Services.

In this role, I was responsible for ensuring that the Linux servers were properly configured and optimized to support the company's business objectives. This involved monitoring server performance, identifying and addressing issues in a timely manner, and working closely with other members of the technical team to ensure that the Linux server environment was up-to-date with the latest security patches and updates.

In addition to my technical responsibilities, I also played a critical role in supporting the company's strategic objectives. This involved working closely with business stakeholders to understand their requirements and ensure that the Linux server environment was able to meet those needs. I also played a key role in the development of IT policies and procedures, ensuring that they were aligned with industry best practices and met regulatory requirements.
